subject: Order #SSN4964
description_text:
Hello. Just recieved my things and saw that the metalpart i need to connect
the haptic motor to the clutch is missing. Both U parts for the accelerator
and brake are there but the cut out for the longer for the clutch are
missing sadly.

OrderNr: SSN4964

Kinds regards.

conversations.body_text: 此工单已关闭并合并到工单 10800 中
